name: Zenith 320L Stationary "FOOTCOCKING DROP" THOMPSON Table
descr:
320L-Zenith Stationary "FOOTCOCKING DROP" THOMPSON Table

Our Zenith Thompson Tables are acclaimed to be one of the finest tables available. This stationary model features four (4) manual drops to include "Footcocking" drops on the abdominal and dorsal. 

Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty 
Tilt Headpiece 
Forward Motion Headpiece w/ lo-force drop mechanism 
Universal Headraiser raises or tilts for ideal set-up 
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser 
Terminal Point Dorsal Drop w/ lo-force drop mechanism {Footcocking] 
Terminal Point Abdominal Drop w/ lo-force drop mechanism {Footcocking]
Slide & Crank Pelvic 
Terminal Point Pelvic 3-way Drop - Pneumatic 
Adjustable Front Section 
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion 
Chrome Base Finish 
Heritage Upholstery in a variety of colors 
Table Length 72 
Table Height 18, 20, 22, or 24" 
Table Width 24 
Cushion Width 18 
Table Weight 210 lbs. depending on options
